titles: Dauids soliloquie Containing many comforts for afflicted mindes. As they were deliuered in sundry sermons at Saint Maries in Douer. By Io: Reading.
author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.
Hulsius, Friedrich van, b. 1580, engraver.
publisher: Printed by [John Legat] for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Pauls Church-yeard at the signe of the Greyhound,
notes: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: F. Hulsius invenit et sculps·.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A¹²  (+engr. title) B-V¹²  X² .
